mapper.select:
select d.id as id, d.LEVEL_DEP as levelDep, d.SUBORDINATE_ORG_ID as subordinateOrgId, d.SUBORDINATE_ORG_NAME as subordinateOrgName, d.BUSINESS_DEP as businessDep, d.BUSINESS_DEP_ID as businessDepId, d.BUSINESS_RANGE as businessRange, d.QUA_CODE as quaCode, d.QUA_LEVEL as quaLevel, d.QUA_EDNDATE as quaEdndate, d.QUA_RANGE as quaRange, d.QUA_CERT as quaCert, d.LEADER_TELEPHONE as leaderTelephone, d.OFFICER_COUNTNUM as officerCountnum, d.OFFICER_NOW_COUNTS as officerNowCounts, d.SOLDIER_NUM as soldierNum, d.SOLDIER_NOW_COUNTS as soldierNowCounts, d.STAFF_NUM as staffNum, d.STAFF_NOW_COUNTS as staffNowCounts, d.PURCHASERS_COUNT as purchasersCount, d.JUNIOR_PUR_COUNT as juniorPurCount, d.SENIOR_PUR_COUNT as seniorPurCount, d.DEP_NAME as depName, d.LEGAL as legal, d.AGENT as agent, d.CONTACT as contact, d.CONTACT_TELEPHONE as contactTelephone, d.CONTACT_ADDRESS as contactAddress, d.UNIT_POST_CODE as unitPostCode, d.PAY_DEP as payDep, d.BANK as bank, d.BANK_ACCOUNT as bankAccount, d.OFFICE_AREA as officeArea, d.OFFICE_COUNT as officeCount, d.METTING_ROOM_COUNT as mettingRoomCount, d.INVITE_ROOM_COUNT as inviteRoomCount, d.BID_ROOM_COUNT as bidRoomCount, d.IS_DELETED as isDeleted, d.UPDATED_AT as updatedAt, d.CREATED_AT as createdAt, d.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName, o.id as orgId, o.NAME as name, o.SHORT_NAME as shortName, o.ORG_CODE as orgCode, o.type_name as typeName, o.address as address, o.post_code as postCode, CONCAT(a.name, b.name) as areaName, d.DUTY_ROOM_PHONE as dutyRoomPhone, a.id as provinceId, a.name as provinceName, b.id as cityId, b.name as cityName, nvl(d.IS_AUDIT_SUPPLIER,0) as isAuditSupplier, d.QUA_START_DATE as quaStartDate, o.QUA_STATUS as quaStatus, o.QUA_STASH_REASON as quaStashReason, o.QUA_NORMAL_REASON as quaNormalReason, o.QUA_TERMINAL_REASON as quaTerminalReason from T_SES_OMS_ORG o LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA a on o.province_id=a.id LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA b on o.city_id=b.id, T_SES_OMS_PURCHASE_DEP d
WHERE d.is_deleted= 0 AND o.is_deleted =0 AND d.ORG_ID = o.id

select o.id as id, d.LEVEL_DEP as levelDep, d.SUBORDINATE_ORG_ID as subordinateOrgId, d.SUBORDINATE_ORG_NAME as subordinateOrgName, d.BUSINESS_DEP as businessDep, d.BUSINESS_DEP_ID as businessDepId, d.BUSINESS_RANGE as businessRange, d.QUA_CODE as quaCode, d.QUA_LEVEL as quaLevel, d.QUA_EDNDATE as quaEdndate, d.QUA_RANGE as quaRange, d.QUA_CERT as quaCert, d.LEADER_TELEPHONE as leaderTelephone, d.OFFICER_COUNTNUM as officerCountnum, d.OFFICER_NOW_COUNTS as officerNowCounts, d.SOLDIER_NUM as soldierNum, d.SOLDIER_NOW_COUNTS as soldierNowCounts, d.STAFF_NUM as staffNum, d.STAFF_NOW_COUNTS as staffNowCounts, d.PURCHASERS_COUNT as purchasersCount, d.JUNIOR_PUR_COUNT as juniorPurCount, d.SENIOR_PUR_COUNT as seniorPurCount, d.DEP_NAME as depName, d.LEGAL as legal, d.AGENT as agent, d.CONTACT as contact, d.CONTACT_TELEPHONE as contactTelephone, d.CONTACT_ADDRESS as contactAddress, d.UNIT_POST_CODE as unitPostCode, d.PAY_DEP as payDep, d.BANK as bank, d.BANK_ACCOUNT as bankAccount, d.ACCESS_NETWORK as accessNetwork, d.ACCESS_WAY as accessWay, d.VIDEO_SURVEILLANCE as videoSurveillance, d.OFFICE_AREA as officeArea, d.OFFICE_COUNT as officeCount, d.METTING_ROOM_COUNT as mettingRoomCount, d.INVITE_ROOM_COUNT as inviteRoomCount, d.BID_ROOM_COUNT as bidRoomCount, d.IS_DELETED as isDeleted, d.UPDATED_AT as updatedAt, d.CREATED_AT as createdAt, d.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName, o.id as orgId, o.NAME as name, o.SHORT_NAME as shortName, o.ORG_CODE as orgCode, o.type_name as typeName, o.address as address, o.post_code as postCode, CONCAT(a.name, b.name) as areaName, d.DUTY_ROOM_PHONE as dutyRoomPhone, a.id as provinceId, a.name as provinceName, b.id as cityId, b.name as cityName, nvl(d.IS_AUDIT_SUPPLIER,0) as isAuditSupplier, d.QUA_START_DATE as quaStartDate, d.QUA_STATUS as quaStatus, d.QUA_STASH_REASON as quaStashReason, o.QUA_NORMAL_REASON as quaNormalReason, o.QUA_TERMINAL_REASON as quaTerminalReason from T_SES_OMS_ORG o LEFT JOIN T_SES_OMS_PURCHASE_DEP d on d.ORG_ID = o.id LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA a on o.province_id=a.id LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA b on o.city_id=b.id where nvl(d.is_deleted,0)=0
and o.id= #{_parameter}

select d.id as id, d.LEVEL_DEP as levelDep, d.SUBORDINATE_ORG_ID as subordinateOrgId, d.SUBORDINATE_ORG_NAME as subordinateOrgName, d.BUSINESS_DEP as businessDep, d.BUSINESS_DEP_ID as businessDepId, d.BUSINESS_RANGE as businessRange, d.QUA_CODE as quaCode, d.QUA_LEVEL as quaLevel, d.QUA_EDNDATE as quaEdndate, d.QUA_RANGE as quaRange, d.QUA_CERT as quaCert, d.LEADER_TELEPHONE as leaderTelephone, staffNowCounts, d.PURCHASERS_COUNT as purchasersCount, d.JUNIOR_PUR_COUNT as juniorPurCount, d.SENIOR_PUR_COUNT as seniorPurCount, d.DEP_NAME as depName, d.LEGAL as legal, d.AGENT as agent, d.CONTACT as contact, d.CONTACT_TELEPHONE as contactTelephone, d.CONTACT_ADDRESS as contactAddress, d.UNIT_POST_CODE as unitPostCode, d.PAY_DEP as payDep, d.BANK as bank, d.BANK_ACCOUNT as bankAccount, d.ACCESS_NETWORK as accessNetwork, d.ACCESS_WAY as accessWay, d.VIDEO_SURVEILLANCE as videoSurveillance, d.OFFICE_AREA as officeArea, d.OFFICE_COUNT as officeCount, d.METTING_ROOM_COUNT as mettingRoomCount, d.INVITE_ROOM_COUNT as inviteRoomCount, d.BID_ROOM_COUNT as bidRoomCount, d.IS_DELETED as isDeleted, d.UPDATED_AT as updatedAt, d.CREATED_AT as createdAt, d.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName, o.id as orgId, o.NAME as name, o.SHORT_NAME as shortName, o.ORG_CODE as orgCode, o.type_name as typeName, o.address as address, o.post_code as postCode, CONCAT(a.name, b.name) as areaName, d.DUTY_ROOM_PHONE as dutyRoomPhone, a.id as provinceId, a.name as provinceName, b.id as cityId, b.name as cityName, nvl(d.IS_AUDIT_SUPPLIER,0) as isAuditSupplier, d.QUA_START_DATE as quaStartDate, d.QUA_STATUS as quaStatus, d.QUA_STASH_REASON as quaStashReason, o.QUA_NORMAL_REASON as quaNormalReason, o.QUA_TERMINAL_REASON as quaTerminalReason from T_SES_OMS_ORG o LEFT JOIN T_SES_OMS_PURCHASE_DEP d on d.ORG_ID = o.id LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA a on o.province_id=a.id LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA b on o.city_id=b.id where nvl(d.is_deleted,0)=0
and o.id= #{_parameter}

ID,
LEVEL_DEP,
SUBORDINATE_ORG_ID,

mapper.update:
update T_SES_OMS_PURCHASE_DEP
LEVEL_DEP = #{levelDep},
SUBORDINATE_ORG_ID = #{subordinateOrgId},
SUBORDINATE_ORG_NAME = #{subordinateOrgName},
BUSINESS_DEP = #{businessDep},
BUSINESS_DEP_ID = #{businessDepId},
BUSINESS_RANGE = #{businessRange},
QUA_CODE = #{quaCode},
QUA_LEVEL = #{quaLevel},
QUA_EDNDATE = #{quaEdndate},
QUA_RANGE = #{quaRange},
QUA_CERT = #{quaCert},
LEADER_TELEPHONE = #{leaderTelephone},
OFFICER_COUNTNUM = #{officerCountnum},
OFFICER_NOW_COUNTS = #{officerNowCounts},
SOLDIER_NUM = #{soldierNum},
SOLDIER_NOW_COUNTS = #{soldierNowCounts},
STAFF_NUM = #{staffNum},
STAFF_NOW_COUNTS = #{staffNowCounts},
PURCHASERS_COUNT = #{purchasersCount},
JUNIOR_PUR_COUNT = #{juniorPurCount},
SENIOR_PUR_COUNT = #{seniorPurCount},
DEP_NAME = #{depName},
LEGAL = #{legal},
AGENT = #{agent},
CONTACT = #{contact},
CONTACT_TELEPHONE = #{contactTelephone},
CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{contactAddress},
UNIT_POST_CODE = #{unitPostCode},
PAY_DEP = #{payDep},
BANK = #{bank},
BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount},
OFFICE_AREA = #{officeArea},
OFFICE_COUNT = #{officeCount},
METTING_ROOM_COUNT = #{mettingRoomCount},
INVITE_ROOM_COUNT = #{inviteRoomCount},
BID_ROOM_COUNT = #{bidRoomCount},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt},
ORG_ID = #{orgId},
DUTY_ROOM_PHONE = #{dutyRoomPhone},
IS_AUDIT_SUPPLIER = #{isAuditSupplier},
QUA_STATUS = #{quaStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
QUA_START_DATE = #{quaStartDate},
QUA_STASH_REASON = #{quaStashReason},
ACCESS_NETWORK = #{accessNetwork},
ACCESS_WAY = #{accessWay},
VIDEO_SURVEILLANCE = #{videoSurveillance},
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName},
SUPPLIER_CONTACT = #{supplierContact},
SUPPLIER_PHONE = #{supplierPhone},
SUPPLIER_ADDRESS = #{supplierAddress},
SUPPLIER_POSTCODE = #{supplierPostcode},
EXPER_CONTACT = #{experContact},
EXPER_PHONE = #{experPhone},
EXPER_ADDRESS = #{experAddress},
EXPER_POSTCODE = #{experPostcode},
where ORG_ID=#{id}
mapper.select:
select d.id as id, d.LEVEL_DEP as levelDep, d.SUBORDINATE_ORG_ID as subordinateOrgId, d.SUBORDINATE_ORG_NAME as subordinateOrgName, d.BUSINESS_DEP as businessDep, d.BUSINESS_DEP_ID as businessDepId, d.BUSINESS_RANGE as businessRange, d.QUA_CODE as quaCode, d.QUA_LEVEL as quaLevel, d.QUA_EDNDATE as quaEdndate, d.QUA_RANGE as quaRange, d.QUA_CERT as quaCert, d.LEADER_TELEPHONE as leaderTelephone, d.OFFICER_COUNTNUM as officerCountnum, d.OFFICER_NOW_COUNTS as officerNowCounts, d.SOLDIER_NUM as soldierNum, d.SOLDIER_NOW_COUNTS as soldierNowCounts, d.STAFF_NUM as staffNum, d.STAFF_NOW_COUNTS as staffNowCounts, d.PURCHASERS_COUNT as purchasersCount, d.JUNIOR_PUR_COUNT as juniorPurCount, d.SENIOR_PUR_COUNT as seniorPurCount, d.DEP_NAME as depName, d.LEGAL as legal, d.AGENT as agent, d.CONTACT as contact, d.CONTACT_TELEPHONE as contactTelephone, d.CONTACT_ADDRESS as contactAddress, d.UNIT_POST_CODE as unitPostCode, d.PAY_DEP as payDep, d.BANK as bank, d.BANK_ACCOUNT as bankAccount, d.OFFICE_AREA as officeArea, d.OFFICE_COUNT as officeCount, d.METTING_ROOM_COUNT as mettingRoomCount, d.INVITE_ROOM_COUNT as inviteRoomCount, d.BID_ROOM_COUNT as bidRoomCount, d.IS_DELETED as isDeleted, d.UPDATED_AT as updatedAt, d.CREATED_AT as createdAt, d.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName, d.QUA_STASH_REASON as quaStashReason, d.SUPPLIER_CONTACT as supplierContact, d.SUPPLIER_PHONE as supplierPhone, d.SUPPLIER_ADDRESS as supplierAddress, d.SUPPLIER_POSTCODE as supplierPostcode, d.EXPER_CONTACT as experContact, d.EXPER_PHONE as experPhone, d.EXPER_ADDRESS as experAddress, d.EXPER_POSTCODE as experPostcode, o.id as orgId, o.NAME as name, o.SHORT_NAME as shortName, o.ORG_CODE as orgCode, CONCAT(a.name, b.name) as areaName, d.DUTY_ROOM_PHONE as dutyRoomPhone, a.id as provinceId, a.name as provinceName, b.id as cityId, b.name as cityName, nvl(d.IS_AUDIT_SUPPLIER,0) as isAuditSupplier, d.QUA_START_DATE as quaStartDate, d.QUA_STATUS as quaStatus, d.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName from T_SES_OMS_PURCHASE_DEP d LEFT JOIN T_SES_OMS_ORG o on d.ORG_ID = o.id LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA a on o.province_id=a.id LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA b on o.city_id=b.id where nvl(d.IS_DELETED,0)=0 and o.IS_DELETED = 0
and d.id= #{_parameter}
mapper.insert:
select rawtohex(sys_guid()) as VALUE from dual
insert into T_SES_OMS_PURCHASE_DEP (ID,ORG_ID,IS_DELETED,CREATED_AT) values( #{id},#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isDeleted},#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT ORG_ID FROM T_SES_OMS_PURCHASE_DEP where ID = #{id} AND IS_DELETED = 0

select d.id as id, d.LEVEL_DEP as levelDep, d.SUBORDINATE_ORG_ID as subordinateOrgId, d.SUBORDINATE_ORG_NAME as subordinateOrgName, d.BUSINESS_DEP as businessDep, d.BUSINESS_DEP_ID as businessDepId, d.BUSINESS_RANGE as businessRange, d.QUA_CODE as quaCode, d.QUA_LEVEL as quaLevel, d.QUA_EDNDATE as quaEdndate, d.QUA_RANGE as quaRange, d.QUA_CERT as quaCert, d.LEADER_TELEPHONE as leaderTelephone, d.OFFICER_COUNTNUM as officerCountnum, d.OFFICER_NOW_COUNTS as officerNowCounts, d.SOLDIER_NUM as soldierNum, d.SOLDIER_NOW_COUNTS as soldierNowCounts, d.STAFF_NUM as staffNum, d.STAFF_NOW_COUNTS as staffNowCounts, d.PURCHASERS_COUNT as purchasersCount, d.JUNIOR_PUR_COUNT as juniorPurCount, d.SENIOR_PUR_COUNT as seniorPurCount, d.DEP_NAME as depName, d.LEGAL as legal, d.AGENT as agent, d.ACCESS_NETWORK as accessNetwork, d.ACCESS_WAY as accessWay, d.VIDEO_SURVEILLANCE as videoSurveillance, d.CONTACT as contact, d.CONTACT_TELEPHONE as contactTelephone, d.CONTACT_ADDRESS as contactAddress, d.UNIT_POST_CODE as unitPostCode, d.PAY_DEP as payDep, d.BANK as bank, d.BANK_ACCOUNT as bankAccount, d.OFFICE_AREA as officeArea, d.OFFICE_COUNT as officeCount, d.METTING_ROOM_COUNT as mettingRoomCount, d.INVITE_ROOM_COUNT as inviteRoomCount, d.BID_ROOM_COUNT as bidRoomCount, d.IS_DELETED as isDeleted, d.UPDATED_AT as updatedAt, d.CREATED_AT as createdAt, d.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName, o.id as orgId, o.NAME as name, o.SHORT_NAME as shortName, o.ORG_CODE as orgCode, o.type_name as typeName, o.address as address, o.post_code as postCode, o.FAX as fax, o.CONTACT_NAME as contactName, o.CONTACT_MOBILE as contactMobile, CONCAT(a.name, b.name) as areaName, d.DUTY_ROOM_PHONE as dutyRoomPhone, a.id as provinceId, a.name as provinceName, b.id as cityId, b.name as cityName, nvl(d.IS_AUDIT_SUPPLIER,0) as isAuditSupplier, d.QUA_START_DATE as quaStartDate, d.QUA_STATUS as quaStatus, d.QUA_STASH_REASON as quaStashReason, o.QUA_NORMAL_REASON as quaNormalReason, o.QUA_TERMINAL_REASON as quaTerminalReason from T_SES_OMS_ORG o LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA a on o.province_id=a.id LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA b on o.city_id=b.id, T_SES_OMS_PURCHASE_DEP d WHERE d.is_deleted= 0 AND o.is_deleted =0 AND d.ORG_ID = o.id and o.SHORT_NAME =#{name}
